ygData.subject: Re: Corpse Recoveries
ygData.msgSnippet: Well there s an update to my corpse recovery story.  When I logged in tonight the guy showed up a couple of hours later looking for his corpse. I was less
ygData.messageBody:
Well there's an update to my corpse recovery story. When I logged in tonight
the guy showed up a couple of hours later looking for his corpse.

I was less tired and feeling a bit more magnanimous so I helped him swim to
the zone and go deep-sea diving for his corpse. Still without Aquatic Ayre,
even though I've hit 16th (haven't bought the song from High Keep yet). Well
it worked. The guy had a set of leather, a few coins and a Bloodforge Hammer.
But it meant a lot to him.

Anyhow, it worked out and I feel a bit better about myself and boosted the
reputation of bards in general I hope.

The guy said "thx", disbanded and ran off. That's gratitude for ya...

Crier - 16 song on Fennin Ro

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/



----- Original Message -----
From: Michael Meadows <meadows@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 1999 10:04 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Corpse Recoveries


> From: "Michael Meadows" <meadows@...>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
>
> >>The last time I saw this guy he was understandably upset, but swimming
> offshore to look for his corpse in the direction that I gave him. Believe
> me
> I wished him well, but I couldn't put my character in that potentially
> disarterous position.
>
> How would others have handled this situation? Given it's midnight, and you
> plan on logging within an hour or so and there's no bank on the island.<<
>
>
> That happened to a guild member and good friend of mine. We both agreed
> that it was ridiculous to try to swim all the way to the zone. He
> /petitioned and explained that he was killed on the boat and the corpse was
> dumped when the boat zoned. The guide kindly summoned his corpse for him,
> since it was where it was through no fault of his own.
>
> Paralto of Povar
>
